mapper.sql: Id, CreateDate, CreateUserId, CreateUserName, LastEditDate, ProjectInfoId, TunnelName, PileNumCode, StartKilometre, StartMetre, EndKilometre, EndMetre, TunnelLength, BuildLength, TestLength, FixCrackLength, BuildAddress, TunnelShowPic, TunnelShowDetailPic, TunnelDescribe, ShowOrder, TotalStatus, Status
mapper.select: SELECT tunnelinfo.Id AS tunnelinfoId, tunnelinfo.TunnelName AS TunnelName, projectinfo.Id AS projectinfoId, projectarea.`Name` AS projectareaName, projectinfo.ProjectName AS ProjectName, projectinfo.BelongCategory AS BelongCategory FROM tunnelinfo,projectinfo,projectarea WHERE tunnelinfo.ProjectInfoId = projectinfo.Id and projectarea.Id = projectinfo.ProjectAreaId

mapper.update:
update tunnelinfo
CreateDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateUserId = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateUserName = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LastEditDate = #{lastEditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ProjectInfoId = #{projectInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TunnelName = #{tunnelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PileNumCode = #{pileNumCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

StartMetre = #{startMetre,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

TunnelDescribe = #{tunnelDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where Id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
